translation.Name: Rio Note - World Paper News #3
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_2: Due to the increasing speed in the spread of the "Zombie Virus" the Brazillian government allowed the ZPD and the military to set up quarantine zones when a location is suspected of containing infected individuals. The military were mobilized in 5 different states, including Minas Gerais, Bahia and in the Federal District.
translation.Interactability_Text_Line_3: Meanwhile, governments across the world have started discussing the threat of this infection as the first countries begin to fall due to it. Both the US government and the Canadian government have declared state of emergency as infection cases were spotted all across their territories.
